julia5.name: Julia
julia5.title: Brides of Light
julia5.description: Princess of the Grannvale Empire whose veins run strong with the blood of the 12 crusaders. She participates in the festival alongside Ishtar. They appear in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.
julia5.duo:
Expand
Collapse
]
Grants【Empathy】to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn, and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit and those allies.
Once used, Duo Skill cannot be activated again right away. At start of every third turn, if Duo Skill has already been used, unit can use Duo Skill again.
(Duo Skills can be used by tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
【Empathy】
Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of types of【Bonus】effects, excluding stat bonuses, and【Penalty】effects, excluding stat penalties, active on player team and enemy team during combat (max 7).
【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).
【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

Castle Hall: **Julia:** This is a truly wonderful festival. The hearts of the people shine brightly.
**Ishtar:** Lady Julia, Lord Julius's twin sister, is precious to me as well.
**Ishtar:** Lady Julia, I offer you my support. Please, take this opportunity and enjoy yourself.

**Julia:** Holding the Book of Naga, Saint Heim offers a prayer to the heavens.
That prayer brings light... And light becomes the white dragon that shines throughout the world...
**Ishtar:** I heard the bride throws her bouquet after the ceremony, and whoever catches it will have their love fulfilled.
Visit: **Julia:** I hope a time comes when all who wish to can join with the one they love. Including Ishtar, and you...
Level: **Julia:** I hope I may find true happiness... Ahh... Was I daydreaming again?
**Julia:** Is it my bouquet you are after? Or maybe you would like Ishtar's?
**Ishtar:** Lady Julia, are you growing weary? You mustn't push yourself too hard.
Summon: How exciting! Both Ishtar and I have long awaited this day. I look forward to the ringing of the bells!
Learn Skill: **Ishtar:** Thank you for these sentiments. It is because of you that Lady Julia and I have had such a pleasant time.
Confession:
**Julia:** Um, Ishtar. Close your eyes for just a moment.
**Ishtar:** Hm? Why, Lady Julia? What has come over you?
**Julia:** On the names of the 12 crusaders... may you find everlasting happiness.
**Ishtar:** Wh-what kind of charm is that? There is no need for you to—
**Julia:** I feel now is a time when it is all right to dream of miracles, so I will go on praying for such.
**Ishtar:** Lady Julia... You are so kind, and you are right. One day, I hope to be with Lord Julius again...like it was before...
Status: *giggle*
"Umm...your dress is lovely." "Thank you. As is yours, Lady Julia."
Conversation: **Ishtar:** Hm. I think this flower looks better over here.
**Julia:** Excuse me... If you're ready, it seems to be almost time.
**Ishtar:** I apologize for keeping you waiting. I was not satisfied with how I looked.
**Julia:** That gown... You must be thinking of Lord Julius.
**Ishtar:** Yes. I would like it if he could see me as beautiful...if just for a time.
Your beauty shines more brightly because you love him from the bottom of your heart.
**Ishtar:** Is there no one whom you have come to love, Lady Julia?
But I do care deeply for Lord Seliph...my brother.
**Ishtar:** Well, Lady Julia, you also look quite beautiful. One might even say that you have a glow about you.
**Julia:** Oh, do I? That must be...because of Lord Seliph's kindness.
He supported me when I thought I had been left with nothing.
When I felt only fear, it was Lord Seliph who told me that he would protect me.
**Ishtar:** I see. I always prayed that you, as the lost sister of Lord Julius, were safe somewhere.
It brings me great happiness to be here with you now.
**Julia:** Thank you. Knowing that you also care for me...it makes me happy as well.

seliph4.name: Seliph
seliph4.title: Light's Legacy
seliph4.description: Descendant of the crusader Baldr and praised as the Scion of Light. He was invited to the festival to fill the role of a groom. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Castle Hall: Who do you suppose will stand by me when that day comes? Wearing such an outfit...it makes one wonder.
I'd want a ceremony in Tirnanog so people who supported me through difficult times could watch.
From my heart, I hope those playing the role of brides at this festival will find true happiness.
What kind of ceremony do you think my father and mother had?

Until we grew strong enough to fight, my companions and I had to hide from the empire.
I hope our efforts benefit the ones who aided us in those trying times.
Visit: Greetings. I am Seliph. When next I visit...it may be that I will come with the one I love by my side.
Level: Let us advance, holding the feelings we have for our loved ones close to our hearts!
The time for blessings is at hand!
Even if there is adversity, if I can find someone with whom I can share both suffering and joy...
Summon: I, Seliph, am here to play a groom for the festival. I humbly ask you all for your patience and understanding.
Learn Skill: I believe it is my responsibility to meet the expectations of the people. I hope I can continue to do so.
Confession:
Summoner, fine work today. Have you reached a good stopping point? I know I am ready for a bit of rest.
It is exhausting at times being the Seliph that people expect me to be.
How can I explain it? It's as if there is the person I am, and then there is the person I must be in public.
This festival may be Askr's, but...I will hold a true ceremony of this kind for myself one day...
To marry someone I can see myself building a future alongside in a world ravaged by the chaos of a long war.
Huh? Who would that be? Well, that is an excellent question...
Status: *hum*
I must admit I am a bit nervous dressed like this. Do I look all right?
Ah! I...wish you would stop teasing me.
Whatever else, Mother and Father lived and loved one another. And I am proof of that.
Such beautiful clothing and...so much love in the air. What a wonderful festival!
There is no doubt that Julia will be radiant in a wedding dress.
When I marry, I am sure I will have Father and Mother's blessing.
I shall never tire of seeing that smile.

larcei3.name: Larcei
larcei3.title: Bride of Astra
larcei3.description: A swordswoman and descendant of the crusader Od. She strikes with all her might like lightning. What fated partner will match her fervor? Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Castle Hall: Does something look off? I'm pretty certain I know how to dress myself. I'm not a child!
It wasn't often anyone told me I was pretty, so...when I hear those words, my heart skips a beat.
This is a good opportunity for me to learn how to fight while dressed in attire like this.
Even after I become someone's wife, I intend to keep swinging my sword. So, this is good training!
I shall win the bouquet! And one day, it will be my turn...
Visit: I'm Larcei, from Tirnanog. Here, I'll share with you some blessings from [F]'s castle!
Level: Step forward, you who tries to steal my bouquet! I'll practice my blade on you!
Prince Shannan himself taught me to fight. You want my bouquet, you'll have to pry it from my fingers!
It's all right. All I have to do is grasp love with my own strength!
Summon: I'm Larcei. I will do what I must to secure victory, at the bridal festival, the Day of Devotion... In any conflict.
Learn Skill: What's this about? I... I suppose I can consider it.
Confession:
I see Lord Seliph is playing the role of groom for this festival, is that right, [S]?
I mean, of course, he's qualified for such a role, but I wonder...
Will there be any reward for the bride who gathers the most bouquets, such as...
letting the winner choose someone they'd like summoned?
If I win, I'd choose... Well uh... You really put me on the spot here!
Anyway! Why don't we continue this conversation after I win. Just think about it, all right?
Status: Hm.
I may not be a child anymore, but this is still a big step.
*gasp* You should know better than to accost a bride. Learn some manners!
I remember when we were hiding with the liberation army in Tirnanog, Lord Seliph and I were never far apart.
I don't think Iuchar and Iucharba will ever let me out of their sight.
Someday, Mother will get to see me in a real wedding dress...
Love befell me, so I will do what must be done.
You've done so much for me. I won't leave your side.

tine2.name: Tine
tine2.title: Determined Bride
tine2.description: A mage and descendant of the crusader Thrud. Swears an oath to be strong and live for both herself and her mother, who suffered great misfortune. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Castle Hall: Lord Seliph is exactly how I heard he would be. I wish I had met him sooner...
I heard that Ishtar will also be participating in the festival. I look forward to seeing her.
One day, I, too, will be with the one I love.
Bridal gowns are lovely, aren't they? I wonder... Would my mother be happy to see me wearing this?
Ishtar treated me as a little sister, doting over me... I remember it made me happy.
Visit: I am Tine. I fled here in an attempt to protect my bouquet!
Level: Mother, are you watching? Lifelong happiness is within my grasp!
I can't give away my bouquet to just anyone!
Tell me, what should I do, Mother?
Summon: I am Tine. So this is a festival where you become a happy bride... Mother... Are you watching me?
Confession:
The spirit here is fantastic. Lovers, brides, grooms... Promising lifelong love to each other beneath the sun.
Things like this are difficult where I come from, with constant war unfolding...
Mother and Lady Deirdre were both powerless against the chaos of war.
But, I don't want the same fate. I won't surrender to it. Mother... Please, watch over me.
Status: Huh...
Ah, such a beautiful dress. Just wearing it is exciting!
Ah! Oh...a-are you to be my escort? Thank you.
Lord Seliph... He is everything I heard he would be.
Ishtar and Prince Julius... They were so in love...
Mother... She always seemed so sad.
I'm actually wearing a wedding dress... *sigh* If only mother could see me.
Allow me to stand by your side, and I will be your strength.

lana.name: Lana
lana.title: Benevolent Bride
lana.description: A kind cleric and descendant of the crusader Ullr. As one who is loved by all, she decides her own fate. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

Castle Hall: Though I am not much help in battle, I am happy just to be by Lord Seliph's side.
I have such fond memories of Lord Seliph and myself playing together as children. I wish to be like that again.
How do I look? If Mother were here, she would ensure everything was in its place.
You would like to know whose bride I want to be? But, I... I never really thought about it.
I have no intention of forgoing my true purpose as a cleric, even in times like these.
Visit: I pray the gods will shower words of celebration upon this land of [S]'s castle!
Level: I pray you, too, will be blessed!
Larcei and Lady Julia deserve to be truly happy. And I, too, will do my best to be happy as well!
I find myself trembling under the gaze of so many...
Summon: I hear this festival is a celebration of sharing love. I will work with Larcei and Lady Julia to ensure all enjoy it.
Learn Skill: Thank you. Let me know if anything troubles you. I will help in any way I can, [S].
Confession:
Wedding dresses are so lovely... Whoever wears such a gown is truly blessed.
I wonder if a day will come for me where I will promise to share a future with the one I love.
Though, there are many lovers who have been torn apart by countless wars.
I pray this sorrow will end, and that all people will be blessed and joined with the one they love.
And so, I will enjoy this celebration from the bottom of my heart and express my feelings to all I love...
Including the one who is most precious to me.
I would be happy if you chose to watch over me as well, [S].
Status: *sigh*
This blessing...
Wish for happiness.
I am Lana. I am honored to be a part of this festival... And in such a lovely dress.
Lord Seliph and I often played together when we were young.
After I marry, I wish to be blessed with many children... That is my hope.
My heart cannot help but quaver when I hear those words.
I worry over you, so...I will stay by your side.
